title: Blue Essence Conversion
body: My rune collector thing said I would get 24k but I only got 8.9k and I'm extremely confused.

replies.body: same thing happen with me im suppose to get 150k but only got 15k

When you login you'll get the initial conversion of your previous BE and IP.  You'll need to complete your mission and open any hextech inventory capsules to obtain any that would convert from previous rune purchases.
